A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: ST: TLJ was a chinese buffet. Lots of stuff you know you're going to like and lots you're not...going into it. Unfortunately this was a bad bad trip. Left full of SW but not comfortable. An hour later I'm not satisfied and hungry again. Stayed away from reviews and reactions\, formed my opinion on it\, then read others. This review mirrors my exact thoughts (sans the mean-spirited \"Shrek\" comments) to a T. https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=9QJRw56cOVw
